name: Blue Hand Felted Wool and Silk Scarf Australian Merino Wool Felt Scarf  OOAK
description:
A one of a kind hand felted Australian Merino wool and silk scarf, soft and light. This scarf has shades of blue and white wool and silk on a prussian blue wool background. Turquoise, cyan, light blue, dark blue.

This scarf is approximately 147 cm x 12 cm wide (approx 58 inches x 4.5 inches). This scarf is so soft, light and warm.

The scarf is folded in 4 in the last photo and this photo is a better indication of colors. 

Please note colors can vary from monitor to monitor.

I have more items for sale on my website at http://www.misstreecreations.com
